Project.name: Employee Admin Demo for Python
Project.Description: This demo illustrates techniques for performing routine maintenance operations in a PureMVC-based application using wxPython view components.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * A port of the classic EmployeeAdmin Demo for ActionScript3 * Uses the wxPython toolkit for UI components.
Project.Installation: Prerequisites You will need Python 2.5 installed. * You can download Python here: http://www.python.org/ You will need wxPython installed. * You can download wxPython here: http://www.wxpython.org/ Installing the Project Source Code From the Archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a EmployeeAdmin_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\EmployeeAdmin_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
